channel.title: Construction Goal
channel.description:
Well.. first off...
[code=java]Public int leechdabid;
public void getleecheddabid(int leechdabid) { leech(); } [/code] REP PLOS PLOS IF U GON USE COAD LOL
Anyways, its been my dream, ever since construction came out, to have a steel dragon and a HUGE house to host parties, and I never had the money to do it, but now, I have the money to.
My Goals: Get 89 construction (I can use pots to get to 95) (98.98863636363636%) <--- Yes, that is an exact calculated number Make my house all spiffy. Get a steel dragon (What mainly was my goal) Host a successful party :P
Overall budget for the project: 53,568,069 Current left: 21,481,581 Current Progress: Getting 89 construction.. (Currently 73, doing oak larders) 10/24/11 Reached level 63. Reached level 64. Reached level 65. Reached level 66. Reached level 67. Reached level 68. Reached level 69. Reached level 70. Reached level 71. 10/25/11 Reached level 72. Reached level 73. Reached level 74. 10/28/11 Finally have the time to construct again :P Reached level 75. 10/29/11 Reached level 76. Reached level 77. Reached level 78. Reached level 79. Reached level 80. Reached level 81. 10/30/11 Reached level 82. Reached level 83. Reached level 84. 10/31/11 Getting Close to my goal! :D Reached level 85. Reached level 86. 11/1/11 Reached level 87. (2 more levels :D) 11/2/11 Reached level 88. (1 moar level!poajsfpsdgj) 11/3/11 Really close to 89..... but not yet.. Overall Progress 25% Wish me luck :D

@drubrkletern wrote:

Only 2 more levels

Currently taking a break.

item.title: Construction Goal
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:18, topic:419358”]Drub do you just want my account? It’s 99con and has steels, demon thrones, maxed house etc. You can just use it as long as you don’t try and change the password and shit on me. You’ll also have to make it member.

If you don’t want it that’s fine but construction is a waste of money. I used to be like you and would host house parties for literally hours every day back in like 7th grade. I realize now that putting all my gp into construction was a waste.[/quote]

Read full topic

Goodluck :)[/quote]
